committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To provide that service performed in or under any of certain nonappropriated fund instrumentalities of the Government be creditable for purposes of the Federal Employees' Retirement System.

summary.text: Provides for the creditability of service in a nonappropriated fund instrumentality of the Department of Defense or the Coast Guard by employees of the legislative branch under the Federal Employees' Retirement System, subject to certain conditions.

titles.title: To provide that service performed in or under any of certain nonappropriated fund instrumentalities of the Government be creditable for purposes of the Federal Employees' Retirement System.
